Sentencas: It is well known that at solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) operating temperatures, volatile Cr species are generated over the chromia scale of chromia-forming alloy interconnect, poisoning the cathodes such as (LaSr)MnO3 (LSM) and (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O-3 (LSCF) and causing the rapid degradation of the cell performance.
Titulo: Mechanism of Cr deposition and its application in the development of Cr-tolerant cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, SOFCs based on the chromia-forming alloy interconnect require the development of cathode not only with high electrochemical activity but also with the high Cr-tolerance.
Titulo: Mechanism of Cr deposition and its application in the development of Cr-tolerant cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the last 7-8 years, we studied, in detail, the interaction between the Cr-Fe alloys and SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Mechanism of Cr deposition and its application in the development of Cr-tolerant cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, the mechanism of Cr deposition at LSM and LSCF cathodes is briefly reviewed.
Titulo: Mechanism of Cr deposition and its application in the development of Cr-tolerant cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Based on the reaction mechanism, a strategy to develop Cr-tolerant cathodes for SOFCs is proposed.
Titulo: Mechanism of Cr deposition and its application in the development of Cr-tolerant cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells
Mechanism of Cr deposition and its application in the development of Cr-tolerant cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells
